title: Eli Manning vs Donovan McNabb & David Carr settles the Joe Montana hash
itunes:title: Eli Manning vs Donovan McNabb & David Carr settles the Joe Montana hash
description:
Dave Dameshek is joined in Studio 66 by Handsome Hank for the Thursday edition of the DDFP! First up, Shek, Handsome Hank and Eddie Spaghetti get into what things you can do to any food to enhance it (2:45)? Next, Shek addresses the recent Donovan McNabb vs Eli Manning crazy debate on Twitter (10:35). Then, while on the topic of NFC East QB's the guys rank who has had the best 21st century quarterbacks between the Giants, Cowboys, Eagles and Redskins (17:40)? Finally, David Carr comes into Studio 66 to field some questions about his Joe Montana comments and how are things with his brother in Oakland (34:35)?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
